alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 14 at 9:43AM PDT until March 15 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Ventura County Mountains, Interstate 5 Corridor, Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor and Western Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds, including Highways 14, 33, and Interstate 5. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills; Western San Gabriel Mountains and Highway 14 Corridor
